treatment.description: Leaf apex with or without bristle, 0.03--0.06 mm; margins long-ciliate, rarely denticulate, cilia spreading. Sporophyll margins usually long-ciliate, seldom denticulate, cilia spreading.
treatment.habitat: Exposed or sheltered rocky bluffs, cliffs, ledges, on igneous, sandstone, or limestone
